statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_type = 'Annual Report';
SELECT report_date, report_type FROM FinancialReports WHERE shareholder_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT report_type FROM FinancialReports WHERE regulatory_body_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_type = 'Annual Report' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_type FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_id;
SELECT DISTINCT report_type FROM FinancialReports WHERE regulatory_body_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_date > '2022-06-30' AND shareholder_id = '321e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type FROM FinancialReports WHERE regulatory_body_id = '789e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE total_assets > 1000000;
SELECT report_date, company_name, total_equity FROM financial_reports WHERE total_liabilities < 50000;
SELECT company_name, total_assets, total_equity FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM shareholders WHERE investment_value > 5000 ORDER BY shares_owned DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, email_address FROM shareholders WHERE shares_owned >= 1000;
SELECT company_name, report_date, total_assets FROM financial_reports WHERE total_assets > 100000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, email_address, investment_value FROM shareholders WHERE investment_value > 50000 ORDER BY investment_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND total_assets < total_liabilities;
SELECT company_name, total_assets, total_equity FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, shares_owned, investment_value FROM shareholders ORDER BY shares_owned DESC, investment_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports;
SELECT report_id, report_name, shareholder_id FROM FinancialReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM FinancialReports WHERE shareholder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Shareholders WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT body_id, body_name FROM RegulatoryBodies ORDER BY body_name ASC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM FinancialReports WHERE shareholder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Shareholders WHERE shareholder_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT body_name, contact_info FROM RegulatoryBodies WHERE body_id = 3;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM FinancialReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT shareholder_name, email, address FROM Shareholders WHERE shareholder_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly';
SELECT shareholder_name, shareholder_email FROM Shareholders WHERE shareholder_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT body_name, body_type FROM RegulatoryBodies WHERE body_type = 'Government';
SELECT * FROM ReportHistory ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_name ASC
SELECT report_name, report_type FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_type='Income Statement'
SELECT shareholder_name, shareholder_email FROM Shareholders WHERE shareholder_address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT body_name, body_address FROM RegulatoryBodies ORDER BY body_type DESC
SELECT * FROM ReportHistory WHERE submission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND status='Approved' ORDER BY submission_date ASC

SELECT report_id, report_date, total_assets FROM financial_reports WHERE total_assets > 100000;
SELECT shareholder_name, shareholder_email FROM shareholders WHERE shares_owned > 1000;

SELECT asset_name, asset_type, purchase_date FROM company_assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT report_id, report_date, total_equity FROM financial_reports WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly';
SELECT shareholder_name, shareholder_email, shares_owned FROM shareholders ORDER BY shares_owned DESC;
